items.sentence: I don\'t know how you lasted five years in that job.
I don\'t really want to bother you with my problems.
Tom doesn\'t have to do that if he doesn\'t want to.
I had a couple of questions, but I didn\'t ask them.
I had things to do, so I couldn\'t leave right away.
Tom locked the door and put the key into his pocket.
Let\'s meet at the same place that we met last time.
Did you learn to speak French when you were a child?
Do you think Tom will be able to attend the meeting?
Do you think Tom will be able to do that by himself?
